details.creator: veraPDF Consortium
details.name: ISO 14289-2:202x - 8.2 Logical structure - 8.2.5.24 Warichu (WT, WP) - Warichu's children
details.description: Content typeset as warichu shall be tagged in a three-element sequence consisting of the structure elements WP, WT and WP, grouped inside a Warichu structure element

rule.description: Content typeset as warichu shall be tagged in a three-element sequence consisting of the structure elements WP, WT and WP, grouped inside a Warichu structure element

error.message: The Warichu structure element has invalid sequence of children: %1
